forecast.day_comments: Rain likely, mainly after 5am.  Patchy fog after 5am.  Otherwise, cloudy, with a low around 36. South wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.

Winds could gust as high as 50 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
